      • buildInfoString

        @NonNull
public static java.lang.String buildInfoString(@Nullable
                                                         java.lang.String string1,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         java.lang.String string2)
        根据提供的参数构建连接字符串预期目的是显示音乐库项目的额外注释。 例如：对于给定的专辑 - > buildInfoString（album.artist，album.songCount）

        Build a concatenated string from the provided arguments The intended purpose is to show extra annotations to a music library item. Ex: for a given album --> buildInfoString(album.artist, album.songCount)

        like ACG-Player-X • ACG-Player-X
